Text: Very rare I have sync issues with mkv/mp4 files but this one is about 3sec outta sync for me.

I confirm what THRobinson stated. There is a significant sync issue. Granted, you can use VLC's settings to resync the audio but there is no guarantee that the audio will not fall out of sync again. Shame because the video quality is very good.
confirmed out of sync, try a different version
